flawed_nl_solution:
Jackson deleted all his old emails so now he only has the new ones left, which he first gets 15 + 5 of = <<15+5=20>>20 emails.
Then Jackson receives 10 more emails to add to the other 20 new ones, 10 + 20 = <<10+20=20>>20 new emails.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
